thread.title: Judge allows Texas to deny birth certificates to children of immigrants
thread.title_full: Judge allows Texas to deny birth certificates to children of immigrants

author: Lyzza
title: Judge allows Texas to deny birth certificates to children of immigrants
text: Posts: 1,226 Judge allows Texas to deny birth certificates to children of immigrants Oh my god. Way to fuck with infants and children, Texas. Don't mess with Texas you little kids! Disgusting. Location: massachusetts Posts: 4,481 So in 20 years they catch some Mexican, and he'll say, I'm an American, man, I was born in Texas, and they'll say prove it, show us your birth certificate, and he'll say, I don't have a birth certificate, that proves I was born in Texas Thanks from LongWinded and Lyzza Location: The Milky Way Posts: 17,996 Good for him, though he seems to have some sympathy. Note that he mentions no sympathy for taxpayers and the real citizens burdened by illegals and their children. Now let us get the lie of citizenship to these children of illegals removed. Quote: Originally Posted by excalibur Good for him, though he seems to have some sympathy. Note that he mentions no sympathy for taxpayers and the real citizens burdened by illegals and their children. Now let us get the lie of citizenship to these children of illegals removed. Not going to happen. That will be a very temporary ruling after the upper court strikes that ruling down as the un Constitutional stunt that it is. Unless the 14th Amendment is changed, no court will ever have such a ruling stand.
